::Zardus/Chaostaur::

Zardus enters the Iron Fist, leading Orchestra to a conference room. He briefly glances the table over to make sure there was no mech fluid on it or anything before entering, remembering having to lead Ominous Prime into a mechfluid-stained conference room once in the past.

"Have a seat," he says to Orchestra, walking to a chair and sitting down. Chaostaur walks by the door, not noticing that Zardus had entered, still working on his gun.
